[Manage Clan Hall]
.
Name Mirror (Teleportation Device)
Cost %funcCost%
Use Teleports clan members in a clan hall to the target staging area

The fee for using this feature must be paid in advance.
The initial fee will be deducted from the Clan Leader's inventory, and subsequent fees will be withdrawn from the clan warehouse.
If there is not sufficient Adena in the clan warehouse, the facility will be reset.
